overview:
Robert has more than 10 years of leading edge technology consumer and enterprise experience, holding key positions with several early-stage technology start-ups in various markets, including: Web & Mobile Development, 3PL Logistics and Mission Critical Solutions, Digital Media and Human-Computer-Interface (including time at companies such as PlayMotion, Cirrugistics and StarPound). Robert has extensive experience in developing and growing his target markets, meeting and exceeding revenue goals and developing internal teams that function smoothly and efficiently together.

Mr. Shoe is a former U.S. Army Ranger and Olympic Caliber Tae Kwon Do Athlete. Robert is also an active member of: T.A.G, StartUp Lounge/Capital Lounge, and regularly volunteers time for charity functions in and around Milton, Georgia, where he resides happily with his wife and two sons.
